Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma did not agree with suggestions that the Indian team’s familiarity with conditions in New York counts as an advantage over Pakistan.
India has played two matches at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, while Pakistan only had a nets session here on Saturday.
Rohit Sharma mentioned that the pitch curator was confused about how the track will play, indicating uncertainty about the pitch conditions.
Rohit Sharma emphasized the importance of mental toughness and experience in difficult conditions.
Rohit Sharma revealed that Rishabh Pant’s elevation to the number three spot was to introduce a left-hander in the top order and provide flexibility in the batting order.
